name: Battle Map Studio
description:
Battle Map Studio is a 3D map editor and RPG playground created by Bradley Shepherd.

With Battle Map Studio, you can...


  • Paint elevation, trees, rocks, with a resizable brush, paint bucket, blaster, or draggable area.
  • Change scene lighting, fog, and time of day.
  • Build forts and dungeons and furnish them with a variety of props.
  • Work in square or hex coordinates.
  • Quickly create rooms, tiles, and entrances with the auto-room tool.
  • Experiment with fun and procedural tools to generate large environments in a flash.


  • Connect with friends online to build maps together in real time.
  • Use the fog of war system for team-only line of sight.
  • Play Battle Map Studio on Tilt Five, an augmented reality system.


  • Place characters and monsters that can move and attack.
  • Roll dice within a 3D dice arena.
  • Create and edit character sheets for your favorite RPGs.
  • Snap top-down screenshots of maps for printing or using with other tabletop simulators.
  • Assign player roles like GM and player to better facilitate campaigns.
